entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
